title: EPOCH-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:



EPOCH



Release Date: 6/2014 Protection: Steam

Discs: 1 Genre: Action



Get ready for post-apocalyptic robot combat! Follow the story of EPOCH, a

guardian robot on a quest to fulfill his primary function in a world

blasted by war. Use your quick reflexes, combat skills and tactical

thinking to dodge, trick and blast the hordes of other robots in your way

Dodge, crouch and leap to avoid enemy fire. Spray bullets, fire Missiles

launch devastating Countermeasures, and activate powerful Boosters. Hone

your skills in the multi-level Campaign, and then put them to the test in

the endless Arena mode



Extract

Burn or mount the .iso

Run setup.exe and install

Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir

Play



Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go

online



CODEX is currently looking for:



nothing but competition!



are you ready?



LNK^CPS 02/2014
